briefdescription.para: Sets the code latency value.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para:
specifies the FLASH Latency value. This parameter can be one of the following values:
FLASH_Latency_0: FLASH Zero Latency cycle
FLASH_Latency_1: FLASH One Latency cycle
FLASH_Latency_2: FLASH Two Latency cycles

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the Half cycle flash access.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para:
specifies the FLASH Half cycle Access mode. This parameter can be one of the following values:
FLASH_HalfCycleAccess_Enable: FLASH Half Cycle Enable
FLASH_HalfCycleAccess_Disable: FLASH Half Cycle Disable

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the Prefetch Buffer.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para:
specifies the Prefetch buffer status. This parameter can be one of the following values:
FLASH_PrefetchBuffer_Enable: FLASH Prefetch Buffer Enable
FLASH_PrefetchBuffer_Disable: FLASH Prefetch Buffer Disable

briefdescription.para: Unlocks the FLASH Program Erase Controller.

simplesect.para:
This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.
For STM32F10X_XL devices this function unlocks Bank1 and Bank2.
For all other devices it unlocks Bank1 and it is equivalent to FLASH_UnlockBank1 function..

briefdescription.para: Unlocks the FLASH Bank1 Program Erase Controller.

simplesect.para:
This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.
For STM32F10X_XL devices this function unlocks Bank1.
For all other devices it unlocks Bank1 and it is equivalent to FLASH_Unlock function.

briefdescription.para: Locks the FLASH Program Erase Controller.

simplesect.para:
This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.
For STM32F10X_XL devices this function Locks Bank1 and Bank2.
For all other devices it Locks Bank1 and it is equivalent to FLASH_LockBank1 function.

briefdescription.para: Locks the FLASH Bank1 Program Erase Controller.

simplesect.para:
this function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.
For STM32F10X_XL devices this function Locks Bank1.
For all other devices it Locks Bank1 and it is equivalent to FLASH_Lock function.

briefdescription.para: Erases a specified FLASH page.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para: The page address to be erased.
Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_BUSY, FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: Erases all FLASH pages.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para: Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: Erases all Bank1 FLASH pages.

simplesect.para:
This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.
For STM32F10X_XL devices this function erases all Bank1 pages.
For all other devices it erases all Bank1 pages and it is equivalent to FLASH_EraseAllPages function.

parameterdescription.para: Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: Erases the FLASH option bytes.

simplesect.para: This functions erases all option bytes except the Read protection (RDP).
This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para: Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: Programs a word at a specified address.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para: specifies the address to be programmed.
specifies the data to be programmed.
Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: Programs a half word at a specified address.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para: specifies the address to be programmed.
specifies the data to be programmed.
Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: Programs a half word at a specified Option Byte Data address.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para: specifies the address to be programmed. This parameter can be 0x1FFFF804 or 0x1FFFF806.
specifies the data to be programmed.
Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: Write protects the desired pages.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para:
specifies the address of the pages to be write protected. This parameter can be:
For STM32_Low-density_devices: value between FLASH_WRProt_Pages0to3 and FLASH_WRProt_Pages28to31
For STM32_Medium-density_devices: value between FLASH_WRProt_Pages0to3 and FLASH_WRProt_Pages124to127
For STM32_High-density_devices: value between FLASH_WRProt_Pages0to1 and FLASH_WRProt_Pages60to61 or FLASH_WRProt_Pages62to255
For STM32_Connectivity_line_devices: value between FLASH_WRProt_Pages0to1 and FLASH_WRProt_Pages60to61 or FLASH_WRProt_Pages62to127
For STM32_XL-density_devices: value between FLASH_WRProt_Pages0to1 and FLASH_WRProt_Pages60to61 or FLASH_WRProt_Pages62to511
FLASH_WRProt_AllPages
Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the read out protection.

simplesect.para: If the user has already programmed the other option bytes before calling this function, he must re-program them since this function erases all option bytes.
This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para: new state of the ReadOut Protection. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.
Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: Programs the FLASH User Option Byte: IWDG_SW / RST_STOP / RST_STDBY.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para:
Selects the IWDG mode This parameter can be one of the following values:
OB_IWDG_SW: Software IWDG selected
OB_IWDG_HW: Hardware IWDG selected

Reset event when entering STOP mode. This parameter can be one of the following values:
OB_STOP_NoRST: No reset generated when entering in STOP
OB_STOP_RST: Reset generated when entering in STOP

Reset event when entering Standby mode. This parameter can be one of the following values:
OB_STDBY_NoRST: No reset generated when entering in STANDBY
OB_STDBY_RST: Reset generated when entering in STANDBY
Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: Returns the FLASH User Option Bytes values.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para: FLASH User Option Bytes values:IWDG_SW(Bit0), RST_STOP(Bit1) and RST_STDBY(Bit2).

briefdescription.para: Returns the FLASH Write Protection Option Bytes Register value.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para: FLASH Write Protection Option Bytes Register value

briefdescription.para: Checks whether the FLASH Read Out Protection Status is set or not.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para: ReadOut Protection Status(SET or RESET)

briefdescription.para: Checks whether the FLASH Prefetch Buffer status is set or not.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.

parameterdescription.para: Prefetch Buffer Status (SET or RESET).

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the specified FLASH interrupts.

simplesect.para:
This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.
For STM32F10X_XL devices, enables or disables the specified FLASH interrupts for Bank1 and Bank2.
For other devices it enables or disables the specified FLASH interrupts for Bank1.

parameterdescription.para:
specifies the FLASH interrupt sources to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
FLASH_IT_ERROR: FLASH Error Interrupt
FLASH_IT_EOP: FLASH end of operation Interrupt
new state of the specified Flash interrupts. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

briefdescription.para: Checks whether the specified FLASH flag is set or not.

simplesect.para:
This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.
For STM32F10X_XL devices, this function checks whether the specified Bank1 or Bank2 flag is set or not.
For other devices, it checks whether the specified Bank1 flag is set or not.

parameterdescription.para:
specifies the FLASH flag to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
FLASH_FLAG_BSY: FLASH Busy flag
FLASH_FLAG_PGERR: FLASH Program error flag
FLASH_FLAG_WRPRTERR: FLASH Write protected error flag
FLASH_FLAG_EOP: FLASH End of Operation flag
FLASH_FLAG_OPTERR: FLASH Option Byte error flag
new state of FLASH_FLAG (SET or RESET).

briefdescription.para: Clears the FLASH's pending flags.

simplesect.para:
This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices.
For STM32F10X_XL devices, this function clears Bank1 or Bank2�s pending flags
For other devices, it clears Bank1�s pending flags.

parameterdescription.para:
specifies the FLASH flags to clear. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
FLASH_FLAG_PGERR: FLASH Program error flag
FLASH_FLAG_WRPRTERR: FLASH Write protected error flag
FLASH_FLAG_EOP: FLASH End of Operation flag

briefdescription.para: Returns the FLASH Status.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices, it is equivalent to FLASH_GetBank1Status function.

parameterdescription.para: Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_BUSY, FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP or FLASH_COMPLETE

briefdescription.para: Returns the FLASH Bank1 Status.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices, it is equivalent to FLASH_GetStatus function.

parameterdescription.para: Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_BUSY, FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP or FLASH_COMPLETE

briefdescription.para: Waits for a Flash operation to complete or a TIMEOUT to occur.

simplesect.para:
This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices, it is equivalent to FLASH_WaitForLastBank1Operation.
For STM32F10X_XL devices this function waits for a Bank1 Flash operation to complete or a TIMEOUT to occur.
For all other devices it waits for a Flash operation to complete or a TIMEOUT to occur.

parameterdescription.para: FLASH programming Timeout
Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: Waits for a Flash operation on Bank1 to complete or a TIMEOUT to occur.

simplesect.para: This function can be used for all STM32F10x devices, it is equivalent to FLASH_WaitForLastOperation.

parameterdescription.para: FLASH programming Timeout
Status: The returned value can be: FLASH_ERROR_PG, FLASH_ERROR_WRP, FLASH_COMPLETE or FLASH_TIMEOUT.

briefdescription.para: This file provides all the FLASH firmware functions.

detaileddescription.para:
MCD Application Team
V3.5.0
11-March-2011
THE PRESENT FIRMWARE WHICH IS FOR GUIDANCE ONLY AIMS AT PROVIDING CUSTOMERS WITH CODING INFORMATION REGARDING THEIR PRODUCTS IN ORDER FOR THEM TO SAVE TIME. AS A RESULT, STMICROELECTRONICS SHALL NOT BE HELD LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES WITH RESPECT TO ANY CLAIMS ARISING FROM THE CONTENT OF SUCH FIRMWARE AND/OR THE USE MADE BY CUSTOMERS OF THE CODING INFORMATION CONTAINED HEREIN IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR PRODUCTS.
